purpose: The email is a call for proposals for workshops and tutorials associated with the JELIA 2025 conference, which will take place from September 1-5, 2025, in Kutaisi, Georgia. The organizers invite submissions on any topic related to Artificial Intelligence, with a particular interest in workshops that explore the intersection of statistical and symbolic AI. They encourage proposals that foster dialogue between researchers in various fields of AI, aligning with the conference's mission to promote research in logical aspects of AI. Interested individuals are invited to reach out for further discussion about organizing a workshop or tutorial.
